dcterms:description: A large cohort of Haematoxylin & Eosin stained breast tumor regions-of-interest, annotated with seven breast cancer subtypes, to evaluate and benchmark methodologies against pathologists and state-of-the-art computer-aided diagnostic approaches.
dcterms:title: BReAst Carcinoma Subtyping (BRACS)

dcterms:description: A publicly available microscopy image dataset consisting of 400 training images from four breast cancer subtypes and 100 test images, used for evaluating methodologies in breast cancer histology.
dcterms:title: BACH dataset
